# searchScopes

**Type Property**

Values that help the system understand the scope of an app intent that shows the results of a string-based search.

## Declaration

```swift
static var searchScopes: Self.Criteria.SearchScopes { get }
```

## Scoping the search

- **StringSearchScope**: Constants that help the system understand the in-app search functionality and its searchable content.
